steps.title: Demon the Fallen sheet
steps.content: This tour will show off the unique features of the sheet used for Demon the Fallen.

steps.title: Example demon sheet
steps.content: Sheet now created, lets open it.

steps.title: Demon sheet
steps.content: This is the Demon the Fallen sheet.

steps.title: Unlock sheet
steps.content: First, we need to unlock the sheet to show it off fully.

steps.title: Apocalyptic Forms
steps.content: As the sheet is created it always have eight apocalyptic forms. These needs to be configurated by both adding which the Demon have.

steps.title: Edit Apocalyptic Form
steps.content: To edit an Apocalyptic Form you click the Edit button of that Apocalyptic Form. In the edit view you can add the name and desciption of the form. Also you can see what bonuses the form has.

steps.title: Add bonus to Apocalyptic Form
steps.content: If a particular form has bonuses connected to them, these can be added here.

steps.title: Activate Apocalyptic Form
steps.content: A particular Apocalyptic Form can be activated here. It is not until an Apocalyptic Form is activated the bonuses connected to that form added to the sheet.

steps.title: Show bonus
steps.content: To show the bonus itself you click this icon. If no such icon exist on the row then there are no bonuses connected to this form.

steps.title: Form bonuses
steps.content: As the icon is clicked the bonuses unfolds into view so you can see them. If the sheet is unlocked you can edit them and/or remove them entierly.

steps.title: Hide bonus
steps.content: If you click on the icon again the bonuses folds again, removing them from view.

steps.title: Demonic powers
steps.content: All the Demon sheet's powers are listed Under Lore

steps.title: Lores
steps.content: Lores works as other powers of the same type. You have the Lore itself which the contains Lore Powers which has a rating 1-5.

steps.title: Rituals
steps.content: The Rituals that the Demon sheet holds are located here. This ends this tour.
